text: Va hamono ʙa qavmi Od dar dunjo cunon tavonoiju qudrat doda ʙudem, ki ʙa sumo nadodaem ej kuffori Qurajs. Barojason xusi, sunavo to ʙisunavand va casmhoi ʙino to ʙuʙinand va dilho to dark kunand, qaror doda ʙudem. Vale gusu casmu dilason ʙa holason hec foidae nakard, cunki ojoti Allohro inkor mekardand va on azoʙero, ki ʙa masxaraas megiriftand, onhoro faro girift
